text: Piero Chiambretti (born 30 May 1956) is an Italian television presenter. He was born in Aosta. He has presented many different TV shows since 1977. His credits include Non siamo gazzose, Va Pensiero, Markette – tutto fa brodo in tv, Chiambretti Night, Chiambretti Supermarket and Striscia la Notizia. In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Chiambretti tested positive for COVID-19. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Italian entertainers Category:People from Turin Category:Italian television presenters Category:People from Aosta Valley
title: Piero Chiambretti
